Giorgi Mamardashvili penalty save against Real Madrid 13' | [Fabrizio Romano] Giorgi Mamardashvili to Liverpool, here we go! Medical today for Georgian goalkeeper as he’s joining #LFC from Valencia. The agreement for €35m package plus sell-on clause will be signed now but he will join Liverpool in July 2025. This season he’s staying in Valencia. | Giorgi Mamardashvili save against Real Madrid 90+6' | [Fabrizio Romano] Liverpool have agreed personal terms with Giorgi Mamardashvili. He’s keen on the move even spending one or two years elsewhere on loan. Bournemouth open to signing him, then he’d become #LFC new GK after Alisson. Agents now in Valencia for club talks NO agreement yet. | Giorgi Mamardashvili (24) says goodbye to Valencia fans as it's his last home game for the club. 

He's joining Liverpool in the summer. | [Liverpool] We have reached an agreement for the transfer of Giorgi Mamardashvili, subject to a work permit and international clearance – with the Valencia goalkeeper set to move to Anfield ahead of the 2025-26 season | Giorgi Mamardashvili save vs. Czechia 45+5' | Newcastle leaves negotiations with Valencia for goalkeeper Giorgi Mamardashvili. Valencia have not budged from their €35m valuation. The players agents have been told many times by Newcastle that they will not go above €30m with addons included | [Romano] Giorgi Mamardashvili remains one to watch in the next weeks as he can leave Valencia for €35/40m fee.  Valencia already signed Dimitrievski as new GK and the plan to sell Mamardashvili remains concrete.  Georgian GK, performing at fantastic level also at the Euros. | [Romano] Liverpool are seriously considering opportunity to sign Giorgi Mamardashvili for fee in excess of €30m for Valencia and then loan him out. No final decision yet but talks continue, it’s up to Liverpool. Georgian GK keen on move to #LFC with loan next, as @relevo reported.

Absolutely smashes the League One record. | [Exeter City] In 2010, Exeter legend Adam Stansfield tragically passed away. Exeter then retired the number 9 in his honour. This season, his son Jay joined the club on loan from Fulham, Exeter allowed him to use his dad’s old number. But when it comes to quality, I don’t agree so much. I think La Liga has extraordinary footballers.” | Kieran Tierney: "You have world-class players like Martín Zubimendi, Mikel Merino, Brais Méndez. It’s not that people don’t think they’re good, it’s just that if you’re only watching the Premier League every week, it’s hard to know. text:
[Tottenham Hotspur] Club statement - Mathys Tel | [Official] Tottenham Hotspur confirm the permanent signing of Mathys Tel from FC Bayern. | [Fabrizio Romano] Mathys Tel has rejected Tottenham bid as he’ll not join Spurs this January. Despite big financial package worth €60m, face to face talks in Munich with Daniel Levy… Tel decided to say no. Chelsea, Manchester United, Arsenal and Aston Villa remain all interested, in talks with Tel | Manchester United refused to pay the £5m (€6m) loan fee Bayern demanded for Mathys Tel - it was considered an expensive risk for a largely unproven 19-year old | [Romano] Mathys Tel to Tottenham on loan, here we go!
Straight loan and no buy option clause.

Agreement reached between clubs as Bayern have accepted player’s decision and player on his way with agent Gadiri Camara. | [Sky] Bayern will receive a loan fee of €10m for Mathys Tel. Tottenham will also cover five months of his salary. They have secured a purchase option of around €55m, which can rise to up to €60m with bonus payments. However, Spurs can only activate it if Tel agrees to a move in the summer. | Thomas Frank on the racist abuse suffered by Mathys Tel: "There's no real Tottenham supporter that would do that [to him]. You'll see the real Tottenham supporters at the stadium tomorrow backing him. I expect big cheers for him tomorrow." | 18-year-old Mathys Tel telling the players to come back to thank the fans after losing 3-2 against Heidenheim but they all left to the dressing room quickly. | [Falk, Altschäffl] Bayern and Tottenham are close to reaching an agreement over the permanent transfer of Mathys Tel for around €35m | Ange Postecoglou says Tottenham looking long-term with Mathys Tel: ‘I didn’t bring him here for six months’

New agreement with Athletic Club for potential salary over €10m net with add-ons based on goals and assists. There are also add-ons based on Spanish NT calls, performances and more. | Nico William's image has been removed by Athletic fans from the mural, near Bilbao: "Leave or stay, you've lost respect." | Lamine Yamal "I used to check social media, but before the Euros, there was a lot of talk about whether Nico Williams and I were truly Spanish, while Laporte and Le Normand were. I decided to stop looking, and since then I don't look at anything, although sometimes friends tell me things." | [Fernando Polo] Discussions between Nico Williams and Barca have stopped for the moment as Nico asks for guarantees on the registration which Barcelona heavily disliked | [Romano] Nico Williams and Barça have agreed personal terms on 6 year deal!Agreement sealed on player’s contract until June 2031 with the salary in the region of €7/8m net per season.Barça are currently working on financial terms to get deal done with Athletic. | Gerard Romero: "Nico Williams had prioritized money over footballing growth." Marc Cucurella: "I don't think it was that... I think he was a bit scared that he wouldn't be registered. And if they can't register you, what do you do then? Even if they promise you... I don't trust anyone nowadays." | [Sport] Javier Tebas shared Barcelona’s confidential financial information with Athletic Club officials during a meeting held just days before Nico Williams' renewal. The Basque club was given access to Barça’s interim financial statements and audit reports

Do you know how much we're traveling? It's not just about the games... Man City plays Sunday and Tuesday, it's not even flexible.
